article_text:
Residents ask for assemblyman’s support of bill

Proposal would allow undocumented children to receive Medi-Cal coverage and adults to buy insurance

Provider shortage needs to be addressed for expansion of coverage to work, Gray says

article_metadata.news-keywords: health for all, sb 4, adam gray, merced
article_metadata.description: Merced organizers and community members continue efforts to seek health coverage for undocumented residents – a move they call a “basic human right.”
article_metadata.title: Merced residents discuss health for undocumented residents with Adam Gray | The Merced Sun-Star
